title: ‘It’s So Hard to Win Any Race’: Cycling’s Raw Emotion on Display After Riders Pushed to Limits
content:
Pros from Magnus Sheffield and Cian Uijtdebroeks to Paul Magnier and Elisa Balsamo couldn't hold back the emotion in a weekend overflowing with wins, crashes, elation, and frustration.

Read the full article at ‘It’s So Hard to Win Any Race’: Cycling’s Raw Emotion on Display After Riders Pushed to Limits on Velo.
